meaningMnemonic: <radical>Say</radical> "<radical>two</radical> <radical>big</radical> <radical>prison</radical>s" with <kanji>pride</kanji>! Nobody said you can't have pride after serving time in two big prisons. So say it with your chest!
readingMnemonic: After mustering all your <kanji>pride</kanji>, you feel like a new person, reborn almost. "I feel like a <reading>子</reading> (こ) again!", you proclaim to the world.
